name: Uh oh its Harold (made in 2 hours)
name_original: Uh oh its Harold (made in 2 hours)
description:
uh oh its harold

this is a game I made in 2 hours for my friend cause its his birthday

you play as Louie Zer in a quest to get the Harolds off his yard and get a gun.

also icarly final boss theme by SiIvaGunner
